title: (x) Very bold unicase font (or various fonts?) - Shire Types {Michael Albright}
content:
Can anyone help identifying this or these fonts? are they variations on the same fonts? or differente ones? thanks.

Image link: [http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/7756/fontinilr8.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016223032/http:/img259.imageshack.us/img259/7756/fontinilr8.jpg "http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/7756/fontinilr8.jpg")

author: egoexmachina

comments.content: .These are Jeremy Tankard’s wonderful Shire Types.
You’ve been racking up the identifications lately, Michael. Good show. ;^)
